title: Looking to Buy Raw T206 Commons
author: Bocabirdman

posts.post_title: Looking to Buy Raw T206 Commons
posts.post_content:
Hello All, 
       When I finally got around to joining this board last month, I had 104 
T206 in my collection. I hadn't scored one in over a year. One month hanging with all of you and I have awoken my Monster. My Monster Number is up to 108.6 (see the Monster Number thread if you are curious why) and I am craving more. I am not anti-slab but they don't excite me. I am looking for a bunch of "raw" commons to start off with. They don't have to be hi-grade but bullet holes, paper loss on the front or obviously trimmed cards will not do. Non-intrusive creasing, minor schmutz, minimal paper loss on the back, and corner wear WILL ALL WORK to some degree I don't care at this point as to which backs I get. Actually the more common backs would help keep the cost in line. I am looking for more than a couple and less than a truckload. If you only have one, that'd work. I am EASY. As I said, I only have 107 commons so far so there are lots left that I need. PM me or respond here...My Monster is laughing at me as I type this....Help me please:):):) I am sure we can work something out......Thanks , Mike 
PS. T205s and T207s are not out of the question either!!

UPDATE: I just wanted to thank everyone that has contacted me. I have snagged 21 T206 from 4 members and 2 T207 from a fifth. I am still looking for more...MORE, MORE, GIVE ME MORE:D:D

See my thread on B/S/T, updated today.
Email me or post there if interested.

Thanks.

Doug
I just wanted to bump this one time .....I NEED MORE!!!:D:D

Well I guess I have exhausted the entire stack of available Common T206  here on this board.. Again, let me thank everyone. This post will sink off the first page from here. I am still looking.......Mike:):)
